name: Food Donation Platform
techStack: React, Firebase, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB,Tailwind Css,Stripe
description: A full-stack role-based food donation platform that connects restaurants, charities, and users to reduce food waste. Includes secure Firebase authentication, admin verification, and real-time food sharing functionalities.
challenges: Implementing role-based authentication, handling image uploads, and managing real-time donation requests.
futurePlans: Add a mobile app, integrate SMS notifications, and implement AI-based donation recommendations.

name: KnowSync
description: A knowledge-sharing platform where users can create, edit, and delete their own articles, as well as like and comment on othersâ€™ posts. Data is securely stored in MongoDB, with Firebase Authentication and JWT for secure user sessions.
challenges: Implementing real-time updates, ensuring secure JWT authentication, and integrating Firebase authentication with MongoDB backend.
futurePlans: Add AI-powered article recommendations, implement advanced search & filtering, and support multimedia content in articles.

name: Find RoomMate
description: A platform that helps users easily find a roommate or post an available room/apartment. Users can sign up, complete their profile, post listings for free, and search for rooms based on location and preferences. Includes direct contact with room owners.
challenges: Implementing a search feature with multiple filters, ensuring responsive design for all devices, and integrating profile-based posting and browsing.
futurePlans: Add real-time chat between users, advanced filtering (budget, amenities), and location-based map integration.
